text: Tharoang ka a: "Piyaratiyaya mi so Allah, go so (Qor´an a) initoron rkami go so initoron ko Ibrahim, go so Ismail, go so Is´haq, go so Ya´qob, go so manga mori iran a taw, go so inibgay ko Mosa, go so Eysa, go so manga nabi, a phoon ko Kadnan iran: da a imbida ami kiran a isa bo, go skami na Ron kami mimbayorantang
